---
title: "About This Lab"
---

We are a group of four graduate students from the University of Washington, Information Management Class of 2026, and this lab is designed to guide you through the core concepts and practical applications of MLOps.

UW Team:

- [Shakshi Gandhi](https://www.linkedin.com/in/shakshigandhi/)
- [Vinod Kamat](https://www.linkedin.com/in/vinodkamat2607/)
- [Arohi narang](https://www.linkedin.com/in/arohi-narang-77b90519a/)
- [Sneha Reddy](https://www.linkedin.com/in/sneha8/)

This lab is developed in collaboration with Boeing, working closely with Jared, Uzma, and Geetha, and supported by the Women in Cloud (WIC) team.

Our goal is to provide a hands-on, structured learning experience that bridges academic foundations with real-world MLOps used in industry.
